summary: Retextures of noble furniture, common furniture, displaycases.
descriptionHtml:
Noble and ordinary furniture retextures. Affects almost all the furniture in the game - tables, chairs, cupboard, wardrobes, tables, showcases and more. Textures resolution of 2048x2048, normal maps resolution 1024x1024.
Installation: unzip the archive, place the textures folder in Data folder. Meshes folder is optional but recommended. it contains a meshes with minor UV fixes. But the texture is compatible with the original meshes. See screenshots to understand and decide.
All screenshots, except those of nifskope, made ​​in the light of a lantern, otherwise quite dark.

Possible incompatibilities: If you use SMIM or other mods containing meshes of furniture, do not overwrite files when installing meshes folder. Or not install meshes folder.

Credits:
Red blanket from Enhanced Noble Furniture 4x _byMike by mikegemini http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5265/?
Decorative lattice from HD Noble Furniture by Arcanesix http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32309/?
Some boards from Skyrim HD - 2K Textures by NebuLa http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?
May be separate small fragments from mods, the name and authors didn't manage to be found out.
author: langley
